getSrcPathUsingNick

public static java.lang.String getSrcPathUsingNick(java.lang.String libNickName,
                                                   java.lang.String modulename,
                                                   java.lang.String version)
                                            throws java.io.IOException
getSrcPathUsingNick return the path name string given library NickName, module name and version number

Parameters:
libNickName - - library name
modulename - - module name
version - - version
Returns:
String that start with the libpath and ends with "/src".
Throws:
java.io.IOException - - if error reading library path file
